requestEpisodesSummaryReport

public EpisodesSummaryResponse requestEpisodesSummaryReport(java.lang.String showId,
                                                            AnalyticsService.DateRange dateRange,
                                                            AnalyticsService.DateGrouping dateGrouping,
                                                            AnalyticsService.ReportFormat format)
                                                     throws org.apache.http.client.ClientProtocolException,
                                                            java.io.IOException,
                                                            ResponseException,
                                                            javax.xml.bind.JAXBException
Generates a report for all episodes in a show. The report will contain information such as the total views, complete views, downloads, etc for each episode in the show. It is important to note that this method just generates the report and returns a token that can be used to get the report by calling getReport(String).

Parameters:
showId - The id of the show that contains your episodes. To get a list of your shows see QueryService.shows(Map).
dateRange - Specifies period of your report.
dateGrouping - Must be one of AnalyticsService.DateGrouping.DAILY or AnalyticsService.DateGrouping.AGGREGATE to list the data by day or just a total for the entire period respectively.
format - the format of the report.
Returns:
This response object includes a token that can be used to actually get the report by calling getReport(String)
Throws:
org.apache.http.client.ClientProtocolException
java.io.IOException
ResponseException
javax.xml.bind.JAXBException

requestEpisodeDailyReport

public EpisodeDailyResponse requestEpisodeDailyReport(java.lang.String showId,
                                                      java.lang.String episodeId,
                                                      AnalyticsService.DateRange dateRange,
                                                      AnalyticsService.ReportFormat format)
                                               throws org.apache.http.client.ClientProtocolException,
                                                      java.io.IOException,
                                                      ResponseException,
                                                      javax.xml.bind.JAXBException
Generates a report for a specific episode in a show. The report will contain information such as the total views, complete views, downloads, etc for each episode in the show. It is important to note that this method just generates the report and returns a token that can be used to get the report by calling getReport(String).

Parameters:
showId - The id of the show that contains your episodes. To get a list of your shows see QueryService.shows(Map).
episodeId - The id of the episodes to generate the report for. To get a list of your episodes see QueryService.episodes(Map).
dateRange - Specifies period of your report.
format - the format of the report.
Returns:
This response object includes a token that can be used to actually get the report by calling getReport(String).
Throws:
org.apache.http.client.ClientProtocolException
java.io.IOException
ResponseException
javax.xml.bind.JAXBException

requestCampaignsDailyReport

public CampaignsDailyResponse requestCampaignsDailyReport(java.lang.String showId,
                                                          AnalyticsService.DateRange dateRange,
                                                          AnalyticsService.ReportFormat format)
                                                   throws org.apache.http.client.ClientProtocolException,
                                                          java.io.IOException,
                                                          ResponseException,
                                                          javax.xml.bind.JAXBException
Generates a report for all campaigns in a specific show. The report will contain information such as the total views, complete views, downloads, click throughs, etc for each campaign in the show. It is important to note that this method just generates the report and returns a token that can be used to get the report by calling getReport(String).

Parameters:
showId - The id of the show that contains your episodes. To get a list of your shows see QueryService.shows(Map).
dateRange - Specifies period of your report.
format - the format of the report.
Returns:
This response object includes a token that can be used to actually get the report by calling getReport(String).
Throws:
org.apache.http.client.ClientProtocolException
java.io.IOException
ResponseException
javax.xml.bind.JAXBException
